sizes_available: 6 x 6 x 6 in. (15 x 15 x 15 cm)
full_text: Colorful blocks make an excellent gift for little ones, and new parents will appreciate that these blocks can be easily machine washed and dried. (Lion Brand Yarn) Lion Brand Pattern #: L10656 SKILL LEVEL: Beginner Vanna’s Choice® Baby (Article #840) Vanna’s Choice® (Article #860) 6 colors, 1 ball each Shown in Berrylicious, Aqua, Pink Poodle, Chocolate, Dusty Rose, Beige Knitting Needles - Size 7 [4.5 mm] 3/4 yd (3/4 m) washable cotton fabric, 45 in. (114.5 cm) wide Fiberfill stuffing Sewing needle and thread Sewing pins Knit squares are assembled over inner blocks, for which fabric squares are sewn together and stuffed. If desired, knit squares can be assembled over foam blocks. You will need 3 foam blocks, cut to 6 x 6 x 6 in. (15 x 15 x 15 cm). The pattern makes 3 Blocks. Each Block is made from 6 Squares, each worked with a different color yarn. Six Squares are arranged and sewed together around an inner fabric or foam block, to make each Block.
name: Ravelry: Beginner Baby Blocks pattern by Lion Brand Yarn
